item.title: ‘Alien: Earth’ Star Timothy Olyphant Wants Everybody to Relax About Reboots
item.description: As he swaps his cowboy hat for some frosty tips in the Noah Hawley series, the actor discusses the joy of revisiting work, discovering the “sweet spot” of fame and his love for former co-star Walton G
